org.jboss.aerogear.android.code

Interface PipeModule


  • public interface PipeModule
    A PipeModule allows special actions to be taken during certain phases of the Pipe life cycle.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean handleError(HttpException exception)
      This will try to resolve an error.
      ModuleFields loadModule(URI relativeURI, String httpMethod, byte[] requestBody)
      When construction a HTTP request, the module can prepare several parameters to be applied to the request body, query, and headers.

    • Method Detail

      • loadModule

        ModuleFields loadModule(URI relativeURI,
                      String httpMethod,
                      byte[] requestBody)
        When construction a HTTP request, the module can prepare several parameters to be applied to the request body, query, and headers.
        Parameters:
        relativeURI - the URI the request will be made for.
        httpMethod - the HTTP method (GET, POST, PUT, DELETE) which will be used
        requestBody - the body of the request, if known. May be empty may not be null.
        Returns:
        moduleFields which

      • handleError

        boolean handleError(HttpException exception)
        This will try to resolve an error.
        Parameters:
        exception - the exception to be resolved
        Returns:
        if the error resolution was successful and the attempt should be retried.
